00043 #ifdef HAVE_VISIBILITY_ATTRIBUTE
00044 __attribute__ ((visibility ("default")))
00045 #endif
00046 void R_init_lme4(DllInfo *dll)
00047 {
00048     R_registerRoutines(dll, NULL, CallEntries, NULL, NULL);
00049     R_useDynamicSymbols(dll, FALSE);
00050 
00051 
00052     M_R_cholmod_start(&c);
00053     c.final_ll = 1;         /* LL' form of simplicial factorization */
00054 
00055     lme4_ASym = install("A");
00056     lme4_CmSym = install("Cm");
00057     lme4_CxSym = install("Cx");

00060     lme4_GpSym = install("Gp");
